title: 3D Puff Heat Transfer Vinyl Sheets 12"x 10" Foaming HTV Press Film Puffy Vinyl Iron on Vinyl for DIY T-Shirt Clothes Bag Pillow Textile Fabric (Black)
features: 3D Puff HTV: When the puff heat transfer vinyl is heated, it expands to provide a 3D effect. The cool eye-catching design of the 3D powder puff effect heat transfer vinyl is super stylish and can meet your various DIY needs.

Easy to Cut & Weed & Transfer: Puff heat transfer vinyl is an easy to cut material, and fully compatible with all kinds of craft machine. Even in your most complicate designs, the 3D puff Vinyl sheets are easy to weed effectively, remove unnecessary vinyl with ease.

Good Adhesion and not Easy to Fall: The 3D puff heat transfer vinyl is made of high quality sticky material, strong adhesion, repeated washing is not easy to lose color, not easy to fall off, not easy to crack. Made of high quality PU material, heat transfer vinyl has good stretchability, wear resistance and flexibility, machine wash without worry.

Multi-Purpose: The 3D puff heat transfer vinyl very suitable for your T-shirt, dress, sweatshirts, jacket, pillow, hoodies, jeans, backpack and so on. Customize clothes using this 3D puff craft vinyl, you are the most special person in the crowd.
Packaging: The package has 3 sheets heat transfer vinyl, and the size is 10inch x12inch. Please feel free to contact us for any dissatisfaction.
description: If you have no experience in making them, please experiment with a small piece of heat transfer vinyl first to prevent waste. Manual operation, please allow slight errors on size.  The colors may exist slight difference due to different screens.  Don’t touch water or other liquids within 24 hours after the puff heat transfer vinyl presses.  Ideal gift:  The 3D puff heat transfer vinyl very suitable for sharing with your family, friends, lovers, suitable for holiday gifts, birthday gifts, housewarming gifts, Christmas gifts, clothing decoration items, etc.
Quantity: 3pcs 3D puff heat transfer vinyl Material: PU Color: Black  Peel Type: Hot/Cool Peel Size: 10*12inch/25*30cm

Step 1: Create your design on your computer.  Step 2: Cut with an engraver/laser cutter/marker.  Step 3: Tear off the excess vinyl part.  Step 4: Use heat press or household iron at about 155-165℃ and ironing time about 15-20 seconds.  Step 5: Tear off the protective film of the plastic sheet.
